addController(address).details: Add an address allowed to control this contract

balanceOfERC1155(address,uint256).details: get the token balance of this fee manager

balanceOfERC20(address).details: get the token balance of this fee manager

ethBalanceOf().details: get the ETH balance of this fee manager

feeDivisor(address).details: Get the fee divisor for the specified token

isController(address).details: Check if this address is a controller

relinquishControl().details: Check if this address is a controller

setFeeDivisor(address,uint256).details: Set the fee divisor for the specified token

transferERC1155Token(address,uint256,add.details: transfer tokens from this contract to another contract

transferERC20Token(address,address,uint2.details: transfer tokens from this contract to the to given recipient

transferEth(address,uint256).details: transfer ETH from this contract to the to given recipient
